name: Having a Blast!
description:
You are a sentient meatball sub with a rocket launcher that fires explosive meatballs on a quest to collect the fabled Golden Meatball!

Why you might ask? Don't think too hard about it and SHUT UP!

Movement left and right is A and D.

Shoot is Left Click, Reload is Right Click or R.

Jump is Spacebar.

Pause is Escape.
